* Module MT 	 adr = ~0x0~

Implements various control and monitoring functions of the DRS Logic

*MT.HIT_COUNTERS*

Counters

|------------+------+---------+------+-----+----------------------------|
| Node       | Adr  | Bits    | Perm | Def | Description                |
|------------+------+---------+------+-----+----------------------------|
|RB0 | ~0x10~ | ~[15:0]~ | r |  | hit count on LT=0 |

*MT.HIT_MASK*

1 to mask a channel

|------------+------+---------+------+-----+----------------------------|
| Node       | Adr  | Bits    | Perm | Def | Description                |
|------------+------+---------+------+-----+----------------------------|
|LT0 | ~0x40~ | ~[15:0]~ | rw | ~0x0~ | 1 to mask a channel of LT=0 |
